knimeNode.name: Qvx Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: reads different QVX file formats and converts them into a readable table format with a two dimensional array

option.name: short name of first option (like in the dialog)

fullDescription.option: Loads a file from QlikView and converts data into a two dimensional array understood by KNIME

ports.inPort: reads various QVX files with different data types that can be understood by KNIME analytics by Monica Sangam
ports.outPort: stores the attributes of the QVX file in a two dimensional array
